abstract: Notable quotes from business articles that appeared in The New York Times last week.
snippet: Notable quotes from business articles that appeared in The New York Times last week.
lead_paragraph: “We’re situated in the finance capital of the world. We just had to know where to look to connect the dots.” Cyrus R. Vance Jr., the Manhattan district attorney, after BNP Paribas admitted to doing billions of dollars in deals with Iran and other countries blacklisted by the United States and agreed to pay a record $8.9 billion penalty to state and federal authorities. Prosecutors said a charity that owned an office tower on Fifth Avenue was actually a front for the Iranian government.
